fields.summary: Brand new install - [ERROR] :  TypeError: Arguments to path.join must be strings

fields.summary: Can not build with simple download, build and run

comments.body:
Hi Rob,

Please check your node.js version. Titanium only supports 0.8.x for now. You can check your node.js version by running this in Terminal:

{code}node -v{code}

If installing node.js 0.8 still doesn't fix the issue (it should), we need you to attach your log file and diagnostic found at Help -> Studio -> View Log File & Run Diagnostic Test.
